modName: Moonlight Tales Essential - Unable to equip chest armor bug fixer
summary: This mod add a small power to fix a random bug induced Moonlight Tales Essential which make player Unable to equip a chest armor after reverting to human appearance.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=5]Moonlight Tales Essential : Unable to equip chest armor bug fixer
[/size][/color][/center]


[size=3][color=#ff7700][u][b]Description :[/b][/u][/color][/size]

This mod gives you a lesser power which allows to remove the invisible chest armor applied by the reequip feature from Moonlight Tales Essential.
This bug can appear randomly or when your transformation is scripted.


[size=3][color=#ff7700][u][b]What is the point ?[/b][/u][/color][/size]

I've created this mod to have an easier and elegant way to fix this problem and avoid the use of the console.

[size=3][color=#ff7700][u][b]How to use :[/b][/u][/color][/size]

The power is automatically added at the first start.
Select the power and activate it.
You will see a message telling you that you are able to wear chest armor.

[size=3][color=#ff7700][u][b]How to install :[/b][/u][/color][/size]

Just install and activate.

You can merge it to spare a slot ;)

[color=#ff7700][size=4][u]Credit[/u][/size][/color]
Thanks to [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/45193647]Darkladylexy[/url] for the test
Thanks to Brevi, Al99, NsJones and Spwned for [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59463]Moonlight Tales - Werewolf and Werebear Essentials[/url] mod.
